Package de.uniheidelberg.cl.softpro.sentimentclassification

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CreateInstances
    This class provides various methods to convert the corpus text files into different formats which are needed for further work.
    Development
    Class for testing on development set for the optimization of parameters.
    Evaluation
    This class provides evaluation methods for testing trained weight vectors on different test sets.
    FeatureSelector
    Provides top k feature selection
    HadoopTrainPerceptronScalable  
    HadoopTrainPerceptronScalable.mapOrderThings
    Mapper class of phase 2; gets the category that the feature belongs to
    HadoopTrainPerceptronScalable.mapTrainSmallPerceptrons
    Mapper class of phase 1 See description of runHadoopJob
    HadoopTrainPerceptronScalable.RandomShardsMapper
    Mapper to generate random shards It works pretty simple: We have a counter i, that counts the number of splits that were processed so far.
    HadoopTrainPerceptronScalable.RandomShardsReducer
    Reducer to generate random shards.
    HadoopTrainPerceptronScalable.reduceCalculateThings
    Reducer class of phase 2; calculates l2 norms and average values
    HadoopTrainPerceptronScalable.reduceUnitePerceptrons
    Reducer class of phase 1; Calculates the average perceptron of the Mappers' "small" perceptrons In the end we have one perceptron per category
    Instance
    Objects of this class each represent one instance (-> review) with feature vector and label.
    Perceptron
    Class that represents a Perceptron with a weight vector, and a number of epochs and a learning rate for training
    WriteReview
    This class offers the possibility to write your own reviews and tests if they are classified positive or negative.
